Source.Name: davfs2
Source.Summary: A file system driver for WebDAV
Source.Description: davfs2 is a Linux file system driver that allows you to mount a WebDAV resource into your Unix file system tree. So - and that is what makes davfs2 different - applications can use it without knowing about WebDAV. You may edit WebDAV resources using standard applications that interact with the file system as usual.
